ruling: - [[Cyber Tutu]]'s effect is a Continuous Effect; it cannot be chained to.
- [[Cyber Tutu]] cannot attack directly if the opponent controls any face-down monsters.

- If [[Cyber Tutu]] uses its effect to attack directly, you can activate [[Rush Recklessly]] during the Damage Step, and even if it raises its ATK higher than the ATK of an opponent's monster a replay will not occur. But if you activate [[Rush Recklessly]] during the Battle Step, a replay will occur.
